author: patrickl
msg: Add setPath() method to bring this data type in sync with the equivalent data type used by Ant's <java> task.

author: patrickl
msg: Add "print" attribute to the <launch> command so that the child JVM's command line can be printed to System.err.

author: patrickl
msg: Have the Launcher.start() method and System.exit() in LauncherBootstrap return the exit value of the last synchronous child JVM executed.

author: patrickl
msg: Set ${basedir} to ".." so that all user paths resolve to the application's installation directory instead of the application's "bin" subdirectory.

author: patrickl
msg: Make the <launch> task's "failonerror" attribute default to false.
